english: Why did my father say this was our only salvation ? We
need to learn all of this, Nea. The only person who can

text: Bunları bize söyleyecek tek kişi de tekfur.
english: tell us these things is the ruler.

text: Bunları neden Ertuğrul Bey'e anlatmıyoruz abla?
english: Why don't we tell Ertuğrul Bey about this, sister?
We can trust them. We've given
them enough of a headache, Nea.

text: Ayrıca şu anda tekfurdan başka kimseye tam olarak güvenemeyiz.
english: Furthermore, at the moment we cannot fully trust anyone other than the local ruler.
Our lives are in danger here.
We'll leave here without anyone noticing...
This is our only option. We
will sneak out of the camp. Come on
How are we going to get out of the village, sister?

text: Ertuğrul Bey ve Alplerin çoğu şu an obanın dışında.
english: Ertuğrul Bey and most of his Alps are currently outside the camp.

text: Elimi sıkı sıkı tut, sakın bırakma.
english: Hold my hand tightly, don't let go.

text: Kızları gözden kaçırmayın. Dragos bizi mahveder.
english: Don't lose sight of the girls. Dragos will ruin us. Come on

text: Geri dön Osman. Seni yanımda götüremem.
english: Osman. I can't take you with me. Do you want to be an

text: Hakkımdaki ithamlara suç ortağı mı olmak istersin Osman, ha?
english: accomplice in the accusations against me, Osman, huh?

text: -Yoksa katilerin kurbanı mı? -Ölürüm de seni bırakmam abi.
english: -Or was she a victim of the murderers? -I'd die before I leave you, brother.

text: Osman, beni dinle, geri dön dedim sana.
english: Osman, listen to me, I told you to come back.

text: Bundan sonrasını tek başıma hallederim. Hem babam merak eder seni.
english: I'll handle the rest on my own. My father will be worried about you.

text: Senin, benim meselesi değil bu abi, anlamaz mısın? Bu, hepimizin meselesi.
english: This isn't about you or me, man, don't you understand? This is everyone's problem.

text: Nasıl bırakıp giderim seni? Sen benim kanımsın, canımsın.
english: How can I leave you? You are my blood, my life. Tell me to die

text: Öl de ölürüm. Lakin git dersen beni ancak öldürerek durdurabilirsin.
english: and I will die for you. But if you tell me to leave, the only way to stop me is by killing me. We need to reach the

text: Gece olmadan yamaçtaki mağaraya varmamız icap eder.
english: cave on the hillside before nightfall . We need provisions

text: Orada geceyi geçirebilmemiz için azık lazımdır.
english: so we can spend the night there .

text: Sen mağarada bekle abi, seni dışarıda gören olmasın.
english: Stay in the cave, brother, make sure no one sees you outside.

text: Ben obaya gidip ikimiz için de bir şeyler getiririm.
english: I'll go to the camp and bring something for both of us.

text: Yalnız ben obaya dönünce sen ortadan kaybolmayasın?
english: But when I return to the camp, what if you don't disappear?

text: Yok gardaş, ben senin peşimi bırakmayacağına ikna oldum.
english: No way, bro, I'm convinced you're not going to leave me alone .

text: Hadi tez gidip gelesin, ben mağarada beklerim seni.
english: Go and come back quickly, I'll wait for you in the cave.
What do you mean, brother? Goo

text: İzler şu tepeye doğru gider İlbilge Hatun.
english: The tracks lead towards that hill, Ilbilge Hatun.

text: Bu yol mağaraya gider. Belli ki geceyi mağarada geçirecekler.
english: This path leads to the cave. They'll obviously spend the night in the cave. Even if

text: Cihanın öbür ucuna da gitsen seni bulacağım.
english: you go to the other side of the world, I will find you. Let

text: Ertuğrul'un gelmesi için yeterince iz bıraktınız değil mi?
english: enough clues for Ertuğrul to come, haven't you? Do

text: Merak etme Kara Bela, tuzağımıza ayaklarıyla gelecekler.
english: n't worry, Black Menace, they'll come into our trap on their own.

text: Kutsal davamızın savaşçıları, beklediğimiz an geldi.
english: Warriors of our sacred cause, the moment we've been waiting for has arrived.

text: Ertuğrul'un canını alacağız. Hepsinin eceli olacağız.
english: We will take Ertuğrul's life. We will be the end of them all.

text: Çok yoruldum abla, daha yol var mı?
english: I'm very tired, sister, is there more road to go?

text: Az sabret Nea, az kaldı kardeşim.
english: Just be patient, Nea, it won't be long now, my friend.

text: Az kaldı kardeşim, dayan, tamam mı?
english: Almost there, brother, just hang in there, okay?
-Put down your weapon, murderer! -I'm not a murderer! Don't you
(Sound of a horse neighing) - Go and hunt down the

text: -Gidin gerçek katillerin peşine düşün. -Benden kaçabileceğini mi sandın?
english: real killers. -Did you think you could escape me? Neither

text: Gayri baban da sen de benden kurtulamazsınız.
english: you nor your father can escape me.
The mud is wet. The marks are fresh. He must be somewhere around here then, sir

text: O vakit buralarda bir yerlerdedir beyim.
Soysuzlar! Çakal gibi yolumuza pusu atmışlar.
english: Bastards! They ambushed us like jackals.
Catch him, I want him alive.
Leave us alone! What would you like?
(Sound of a bow being drawn) (Sound of an arrow striking)

text: Obadan kaçıp Tekfur Yannis’e gittiğinizi bilirim.
english: fled from the tribe and went to Tekfur Yannis .

text: İmdi bana her şeyi baştan anlat.
english: Now tell me everything from the beginning.

text: Beni kan dökmeye mecbur etme hatun!
english: n't force me to shed blood, woman! Haven't you already
That's enough! You killed my Alps, you killed my father.

text: (Osman dış ses) Savcı abimle ormanda düşmandan kendimizi kollarken...
english: (Osman's voiceover) While my prosecutor brother and I were protecting ourselves from the enemy in the forest...

text: ...adamların hepsinin yüzleri kapalıydı. Lakin ben bir şey gördüm.
english: ...all the men had their faces covered. But I saw something.

text: Adamlardan bir tanesinin elinde dövme vardı. Tırpana benziyordu.
english: One of the men had a tattoo on his hand. It resembled a scythe.
So it was you who was harassing my children?

text: O veletlerin elimden kurtuldu. Ama senin sonunu getireceğim.
english: Those kids escaped from my grasp. But I will bring about your end.

text: Yalnız seni değil, köpekliğini yaptığın sahibini de öldüreceğim.
english: I will kill not only you, but also the master you serve as a dog.
Where did these jackals come from?

text: Önce Alplerimin, sonra babamın canına kıydın.
english: First you took the life of my Alps, then the life of my father .

text: İmdi senin cezanı kendi ellerimle keseceğim.
english: Now I will mete out your punishment with my own hands.

text: Sözüme itimat etmezsin, bilirim İlbilge Hatun.
english: don't trust my word, Ilbilge Hatun.

text: Lakin bu dizginlenemez öfkene mani olmazsan...
english: But if you don't control this unbridled rage ...
...you will be responsible for the bloodshed of an innocent person.
But I will bring about your end.
...that will be a feast for the real murderers.
(Sound of a blow) It is permissible in our religion and our traditions to

text: Döktüğün kanların hesabını sormak dinimizde de töremizde de helaldir.
english: demand accountability for the blood you have spilled .
no fear of you... ...or of death.
I bear witness that there is no god but Allah...

text: ...ve eşhedü enne Muhammeden abdühü ve resulühü.
english: ...and I bear witness that Muhammad is His servant and messenger.

text: Eli dövmeli iti bana bırakın. Onu canlı alacağız.
english: Leave the dog with the tattooed hand to me. We'll get him alive. Let

text: De bakalım, Dragos denen o it kim?
english: , who is this bastard called Dragos?
